Description: Strip and Underground Mine Administrative Penalty
Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on November 30, 2020 in response to an open records request.

Description: Signal Peak Energy, LLC, which operates an underground coal mine near Roundup, admitted to criminal charges that it willfully violated health and safety standards and agreed to pay a $1 million fine and be put on probation.
Info Source: https://www.justice.gov/usao-mt/pr/signal-peak-energy-admits-violating-health-safety-regulations-roundup-area-coal-mine
